## SonarQube

SonarQube like SAST

[SonarQube](https://www.sonarsource.com/products/sonarqube/)

## Motivation

- open source
- good comments


## How to use SonarQube

### comand line

```
mvn clean verify sonar:sonar \
  -Dsonar.projectKey=<nombproject> \
  -Dsonar.host.url=<ip> \
  -Dsonar.login=<token>
```

### Reference how to use SonarQube

[Instructions](https://docs.sonarqube.org/9.6/analyzing-source-code/scanners/sonarscanner-for-maven/)
